content: Please review and nitpick the How To Shiny Future page y'all :)

one interesting question is about the "scope" and "roadmap"--- I included some thoughts on that, and also some FAQs (e.g., 'Does realizing this future require cooperation between many projects? (Optional) ")
I don't thikn we should limit people
i think they should write whatever the heck it is they want
but when @tmandry and I try to coallesce, we're obviously going to take into account what is appropriate for the Rust org to do, and what ultimately is up to ecosystem projects to do
One thought I have is that by exploring the idea through the lens of the different characters we are implicitly talking about which values we care about
(though not how we rank them relative to each other)
anyway, it seems helpful to make sure all the potential tenets are touched on in the FAQ
ack, I should take that tenet work we did and try to make it into a PR, shouldn't I...
